main.name: Michael McTighe
main.description: I am great at failing forward. As long as I learn something, I am moving in the right direction.
main.bio: I am a creative problem solver with experience building full-stack web services using JavaScript, React/Redux, and Ruby on Rails. After taking a course on programming logic, I was hooked on the path of Software Engineering.
main.contactmessage: Hey, it looks like you want to connect.

resume.skillmessage: My skills at this time are centered around full-stack web development but I am adding to the list as we speak!

education.description: Full Stack Web Development, Ruby on Rails and JavaScript immersive program

projects.title: Checkin
projects.category: Google chrome extension that helps users remove barriers while accomplishing goals.

projects.title: CashDash
projects.category: A React and Rails application that allows a user to make accounts, deposits, and withdrawals

projects.title: Deaddit
projects.category: JavaScript and Rails application that is a message board that allows users to create comments and posts

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
